collection.column: name = dep, id = id, userId = userId

mapper.select: select * from department d where exists ( select u.id from `user` u where u.did = d.id)

SELECT distinct #{id} as id, #{userId} as userId,d.name as dep FROM workday_tec w, workday_tec_principal p, department d, technology t where w.volume_tec = t.name and d.id = t.did and w.id = p.workday_tec_id and p.user_id = #{userId} and w.project_id = #{id}
SELECT distinct d.name as dep, #{id} as id FROM workday_tec w, department d, technology t where w.volume_tec = t.name and d.id = t.did and w.project_id = #{id}

SELECT (select sum(amount) as amount from checker_amount a where a.cd_id = c.id AND a.year = YEAR(now())) as amount, (select ifnull(sum(used),0) from checker_used u where u.cd_id = c.id AND u.year = YEAR(now())) as used FROM checker_dep d WHERE d.id = #{id}

SELECT (select sum(amount) as amount from checker_amount a where a.cd_id = d.id AND a.year = YEAR(now())) as amount, (select ifnull(sum(used),0) from checker_used u where u.cd_id = d.id AND u.year = YEAR(now())) as used FROM checker_dep d WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} and d.did = #{did}

select c.id, c.user_id, c.did, c.name, if(c.amount-c.used >0, true, false) as disabled from( SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.did, CONCAT_WS( "-", u.`name`, SUBSTRING_INDEX( d.`name`, "-",- 1 )) AS `name`, (select sum(amount) as amount from checker_amount a where a.cd_id = c.id AND a.year = YEAR(now())) as amount, (select ifnull(sum(used),0) from checker_used u where u.cd_id = c.id AND u.year = YEAR(now())) as used FROM `user` u, department d, checker_dep c WHERE c.user_id = u.id AND c.did = d.id)c
